## SseTransport class

Low-level SSE transport implementation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SseTransport<TRaw = unknown> implements Transport<TRaw> 
```
**Implements:** [Transport](./rtsk.transport.md)<!-- -->&lt;TRaw&gt;

## Remarks

This is an advanced API. Most consumers should prefer [createStream()](./rtsk.createstream.md)<!-- -->, which provides a higher-level, protocol-agnostic interface with lifecycle management.

This transport is exposed for advanced use cases such as custom wiring, testing, or direct transport control.
